meanings.sent1: She daunders around the park, enjoying the sunshine.

meanings.definition: To waste time or be idle.
meanings.sent1: Stop daundering and start working on your project.
meanings.sent2: She daunders away the hours on her phone, scrolling mindlessly.
meanings.sent3: He daunders so much that he never finishes anything on time.
meanings.sent4: Time daunders away like sand slipping through fingers.
meanings.sent5: The students daunder in the classroom, avoiding their assignments.
